body:
archetype (adl_version=1.4; uid=4737a74c-e554-4e1d-98a0-5bb6d5134ab5)
	openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.ada_criteria_dm.v0

concept
	[at0000]

language
	original_language = <[ISO_639-1::en]>

description
	original_author = <
		["date"] = <"2024-05-17">
	>
	lifecycle_state = <"unmanaged">
	details = <
		["en"] = <
			language = <[ISO_639-1::en]>
		>
	>
	other_details = <
		["licence"] = <"This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/.">
		["custodian_organisation"] = <"openEHR Foundation">
		["original_namespace"] = <"org.openehr">
		["original_publisher"] = <"openEHR Foundation">
		["custodian_namespace"] = <"org.openehr">
		["MD5-CAM-1.0.1"] = <"34d9cbc6ed4685ca68d4c1b3384be603">
		["build_uid"] = <"56ba0c81-58f2-31a6-a201-a468f2ec3a15">
	>

definition
	EVALUATION[at0000] matches {    -- ada_criteria_dm
		data matches {
			ITEM_TREE[at0001] matches {    -- Item tree
				items cardinality matches {0..*; unordered} matches {
					CLUSTER[at0002] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- criteria
						items cardinality matches {1..*; unordered} matches {
							ELEMENT[at0013] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- Symptoms of hyperglycemia or hyperglycemic crisis
								value matches {
									DV_BOOLEAN matches {*}
								}
							}
							ELEMENT[at0014] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- Random plasma glucose ≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L)
								value matches {
									DV_BOOLEAN matches {*}
								}
							}
							ELEMENT[at0018] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- Fasting plasma glucose
								value matches {
									C_DV_QUANTITY <
										property = <[openehr::119]>
										list = <
											["1"] = <
												units = <"mg/L">
												magnitude = <|30.0..2000.0|>
											>
										>
									>
								}
							}
							ELEMENT[at0019] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- HbA1C
								value matches {
									C_DV_QUANTITY <
										property = <[openehr::507]>
										list = <
											["1"] = <
												units = <"%">
											>
										>
									>
								}
							}
							ELEMENT[at0021] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- 2-hour plasma glucose
								value matches {
									C_DV_QUANTITY <
										property = <[openehr::119]>
										list = <
											["1"] = <
												units = <"mg/L">
												magnitude = <|30.0..2000.0|>
											>
										>
									>
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		protocol matches {
			ITEM_TREE[at0003] matches {*}    -- Item tree
		}
	}

ontology
	term_definitions = <
		["en"] = <
			items = <
				["at0000"] = <
					text = <"ada_criteria_dm">
					description = <"ada_criteria_dm">
				>
				["at0001"] = <
					text = <"Item tree">
					description = <"@ internal @">
				>
				["at0002"] = <
					text = <"criteria">
					description = <"">
				>
				["at0003"] = <
					text = <"Item tree">
					description = <"@ internal @">
				>
				["at0013"] = <
					text = <"Symptoms of hyperglycemia or hyperglycemic crisis">
					description = <"In a patient with classic symptoms of hyperglycemia or hyperglycemic crisis">
				>
				["at0014"] = <
					text = <"Random plasma glucose ≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L)">
					description = <"Random plasma glucose ≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L).">
				>
				["at0018"] = <
					text = <"Fasting plasma glucose">
					description = <" FPG ≥126 mg/dL (7 mmol/L). Fasting is defined as no caloric intake for at least 8 hours.">
				>
				["at0019"] = <
					text = <"HbA1C">
					description = <"1. A1C ≥6.5%. The test should be performed in a laboratory using a method that is NGSP certified and standardized to the DCCT assay, In the absence of unequivocal hyperglycemia, diagnosis requires 2 abnormal test results from the same sample or in 2 separate test samples.">
				>
				["at0021"] = <
					text = <"2-hour plasma glucose">
					description = <"2-hour plasma glucose ≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L) during an OGTT. The test should be performed as described by the World Health Organization, using a glucose load containing the equivalent of 75 g anhydrous glucose dissolved in water.">
				>
			>
		>
	>
